channel.title: Wondering If I... (read first)
channel.description:
Ok So Im Following Rics Tut on Webclient And Ive Did This Step But.. 2.3 - Step 3 - Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java(Sprites) Now for the sprite part. Which most people don't do right. I don't know why. =\ Open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and replace all:
./Sprites/
with this
C:/.yourclientname_file_store_32/Sprites/
But In My Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java I Have Other Stuff Called Spirts Not Spirtes Do I Still Do The Same Process For Them As I Did For The Spirtes One?

item.title: Wondering If I... (read first)
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

Ok So Im Following Rics Tut on Webclient And
Ive Did This Step But…

2.3 - Step 3 - Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java(Sprites)
Now for the sprite part. Which most people don’t do right. I don’t know why. =
Open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and replace all:

./Sprites/

with this

C:/.yourclientname_file_store_32/Sprites/

But In My Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java
I Have Other Stuff Called Spirts Not Spirtes Do I Still Do The Same Process For Them As I Did For The Spirtes One?

Read full topic
